#summary ElementXML Notes

Consider the following XML file:

{{{
<alpha>
  <bravo uno="1" dos="two"></bravo>
  <charlie></charlie>
</alpha>
}}}

Here is one way to parse it (missing some error handling code):
{{{

if (rootTag == null) {

}

if (rootTag.IsTag("alpha")) {

  ElementXML mainTag = null;
  for (int rootTagIndex = 0 ; rootTagIndex < rootTag.GetNumberChildren() ; ++rootTagIndex) {

    mainTag = new ElementXML();
    rootTag.GetChild(mainTag, rootTagIndex);

    if (mainTag.IsTag("bravo")) {
